author: DistroTube
description:
For a few years, I have tinkered with building my own Linux distro (DTOS). It started life as an Arch Linux post-installation script. Then it was an ISO with the calamares installer. Both of these approaches had their pros and cons. Now I'm working on something different for DTOS.

title: Building Yet Another Pointless Linux Distro
